attributes.comment:
Please reconsider raising the fees for biometrics and the I-600A form. The vast
majority of people who are adopting internationally have already gone through very
expensive fertility treatments and have turned to adoption as their last chance to
be parents. The wait time for parents adopting from China has increased to
approximately 2 years for the entire adoption process. China is the most popular
country to adopt from because of it's stable adoption program and a better chance
at getting healthy babies. However, most applicants will have to re-file their I-600A
due to long wait times in China recently. Families who have already paid more
than they can afford on fertility treatments are now having to pay the U.S.
government twice for refiling the I-600A form. Increasing the fees makes the whole
situation more grim for people who are already strapped for cash. Please don't
punish people who are simply trying to become parents. Thank you.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
